# Portfolio SvelteKit + Django Project

## Project Overview
Dynamic portfolio website with SvelteKit frontend and Django REST API backend.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: SvelteKit, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL
- **Auth**: JWT tokens
- **Deployment**: Vercel (frontend), Railway/Render (backend)

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - SvelteKit application
- `/backend` - Django REST API

## Features
- Public portfolio pages (Hero, Skills, Projects, Experience, Certifications, Contact, Blog)
- Admin panel at /xenon (login at /whoami)
- Contact form with message storage
- Image/video uploads
- RESTful API
